io.dropwizard.logging

Class AsyncAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase
      • ch.qos.logback.core.AppenderBase<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>
        • io.dropwizard.logging.AsyncAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ch.qos.logback.core.Appender<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.FilterAttachable<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.LifeCycle

    public class AsyncAppender
extends ch.qos.logback.core.AppenderBase<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>
    An asynchronous appender. Log entries are added to an in-memory queue and an offline thread handles the responsibility sending batches of events to the delegate. The worker thread will wait for either a specific number of events or a specific amount of time to have passed before processing events.
